definition: to be out of form/not to be oneself

pinyin: chi2 xu4 xing4 zhi2 wu4 ren2 zhuang4 tai4
chi2 xu4 xing4 zhi2 wu4 zhuang4 tai4

definition: standard conditions for temperature and pressure

sentences.english: Research exceeds a general designation of science and technology below cold condition this kind to learn for microtherm .
sentences.chinese: 探究這種超冷狀態下的科學技術統稱爲低溫學。

sentences.english: It also reflects the pantheistic experimentation of the period immediately following the Civil War.
sentences.chinese: 同時也反映出了泛神論時期緊跟的內戰時期狀態。

sentences.english: In technical side, short and mid-term technical indicators keep on rise.
sentences.chinese: 技術面，短期及中期各項技術指標保持多頭強勢狀態。

sentences.english: View build history and build status directly in Mingle.
sentences.chinese: 在Mingle中直接觀看構建歷史與構建狀態。

sentences.english: Feel how you are coming into s state of Balance with the Earth.
sentences.chinese: 感受你現在進入到一種與地球完全合一的全然狀態。

sentences.english: Judging by recent form, he should easily pass the exam.
sentences.chinese: 全隊經過六個月的訓練競技狀態極佳。

sentences.english: They were always at the state of curiosity.
sentences.chinese: 他們一直處於好奇的狀態。

sentences.english: His horse, Eastern Express, seemed ready to run and win the race.
sentences.chinese: 他的坐騎“東方快車”顯得狀態頗佳。

sentences.english: The air is rather unstable near the moisture frontal zone.
sentences.chinese: 同時有很強的溼度鋒區，大氣處於不穩定狀態。

sentences.english: A design method of PCI Slave IP which based on multi-state machine structure is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了基於多狀態機結構的從PCI設計方法。

sentences.english: This mirrors the situation when we are watching a public figure apologizing.
sentences.chinese: 這反映了我們觀看一個公衆人物道歉時的狀態。

sentences.english: This almost-falling into chaos keeps life proliferating.
sentences.chinese: 這種幾近墜落乃至混沌的運行狀態確保了生命的增殖。

sentences.english: Phosphated bodies should be uniformly wet or dry when they enter the phosphate bath.
sentences.chinese: 磷化過的車身必須全溼或全乾狀態進入電泳槽。

sentences.english: Vapor starts to form, because it wants to be in the coexistence line.
sentences.chinese: 蒸汽開始形成，因爲體系要處於共存狀態。

sentences.english: Carlo Ancelotti's side doesn't look to be in top form.
sentences.chinese: 安切落蒂的隊伍看起來不在最佳狀態。

sentences.english: Men, as a rule of thumb, should always keep their nails clipped.
sentences.chinese: 男人一般來說都應該保持指甲處於修剪過的狀態。

definition: attitude (of the heart)/state of one's psyche/way of thinking/mentality
